cm:migrate-rte.description: Migration script for migrating HTML RTE to JSON RTE
examples: csdx cm:migrate-rte -a alias -c content_type_uid -h htmlPath -j jsonPath
csdx cm:migrate-rte -a alias -c content_type_uid -h modular_block_uid.block_uid.html_rte_uid -j modular_block_uid.block_uid.json_rte_uid
csdx cm:migrate-rte -a alias -c content_type_uid -h group_uid.html_rte_uid -j group_uid.json_rte_uid
csdx cm:migrate-rte -a alias -c global_field_uid -g -h htmlPath -j jsonPath

configPath.name: configPath
configPath.description: Path to config file to be used

alias.name: alias
alias.description: Alias for the management token to be used

content_type.name: content_type
content_type.description: The content-type from which entries need to be migrated

isGlobalField.name: isGlobalField
isGlobalField.description: This flag is set to false by default. It indicates that current content-type is global-field

yes.name: yes
yes.description: Agree to process the command with the current configuration

htmlPath.name: htmlPath
htmlPath.description: Provide path of Html RTE to migrate

jsonPath.name: jsonPath
jsonPath.description: Provide path of JSON RTE to migrate

delay.name: delay
delay.description: Provide delay in ms between two entry update
